title: Simplify Collapsible Laundry Basket | Portable | Space Saver Storage | Hold 2 Loads | Store Under the Bed or Closet | Good for Kids | Dorm | Bedroom | Large | White/Grey
features: DIMENSIONS: 24.6"x 17.7"x 11". It has a 27 Liter capacity.

COLLAPSIBLE: This laundry hamper helps you to save space in your room by collapsing when not in use. When done your laundry the basket can collapse into a compact sized to be stored away. This frees up floor or cabinet space.
HANDLES: There are 2 built in handles for easy carrying and transportation. It makes it easier to transport your laundry and other items.
MULTIPURPOSE: This collapsible basket is perfect for dorms, apartments, and laundry rooms. It can hold a large load of laundry.
LIGHTWEIGHT: The basket and lightweight and sturdy making it easy to carry around.
description: Make doing laundry a breeze with the Simplify Collapsible Laundry Basket. The innovative laundry basket conveniently collapses flat for space saving easy storage! A 27 Liter capacity allows for the basket to hold one large load of laundry at a time. Made with 2 built in handles to make for easy transporting, the basket is lightweight and sturdy. Conveniently collapse and store under a bed or in a closet without taking up much space!
